li.p: Press the Battery capacity test bar to expand the content if needed.
Press the Start button in line with Battery capacity test to start the test.
To end the battery test early, press the Stop button.

body.result:
It is possible to configure the batter capacity test to discharge to a set capacity or for a set duration. In addition it can also be done with fixed current or fixed power.
The available settings are:
Capacity: The battery is discharged until a set capacity, variable current and variable power.
Capacity with fixed current: A The battery is discharged until a set capacity, fixed current and variable power.
Capacity with fixed power: The battery is discharged until a set capacity, variable current and fixed power.
Support time: The battery is discharged for a set duration with variable current and variable power.
Support time with fixed current: The battery is discharged for a set duration with fixed current and variable power.
Support time with fixed power: The battery is discharged for a set duration with variable current and fixed power.
If the cell voltage is above the abort voltage until the set capacity warning level is reached or the set duration have elapsed the battery capacity test is successful. If the battery cell voltage at any time does not stay above the abort voltage, the test is interrupted and considered unsuccessful.
To check the settings navigate to Service > PRIME > Battery tests while logged in as a user with Service access.
